If the JSON object contains array items,: If the JSON object contains array items, parse them. eg: { "arrayKey": [ "item1", "item2" ] will be parsed as "arrayKey", "arrayKey.0", "arrayKey.1", if set to false, only "arrayKey" will be parsed.
Include array index in path: パスに配列インデックスを含める
Please input JSON example like { \"key1\: { "key1": "item1", "key2": "item2" } のようなJSONサンプルを入力してください
Please update other node references to t: Please update other node references to the key after clicking the parse button.
Used for mapping any JSON data to struct: Used for mapping any JSON data to structured variables for usage in subsequent nodes.
